The code outline:

program main

implicit none

! Variables for first part

character(len=5) :: time1, time2

integer :: h1, m1, h2, m2, total1, total2, result_total, result_h, result_m

character(len=5) :: result_time

! Variables for second part

character(len=10) :: output_digits

logical :: s

integer :: i, len_result

! Variables for third part

integer :: x

real :: sqrt_num

logical :: found

! Read input times

read(*,*) time1, time2

! Process first part

read(time1(1:2), '(I2)') h1

read(time1(4:5), '(I2)') m1

read(time2(1:2), '(I2)') h2

read(time2(4:5), '(I2)') m2

total1 = h1 * 60 + m1

total2 = h2 * 60 + m2

result_total = total1 - total2

if (result_total < 0) then

   result_total = result_total + 1440

end if

result_h = result_total / 60

result_m = mod(result_total, 60)

! Format result_time as HH:MM with leading zeros

write(result_time, '(I2.2,A1,I2.2)') result_h, ':', result_m

! Process second part

output_digits = ''

s = .false.

do i = 1, len_trim(result_time)

   character(len=1) :: c

   c = result_time(i:i)

   if (c == '.') then

      if (s) then

          output_digits = trim(output_digits) // '1'

          s = .false.

      else

          output_digits = trim(output_digits) // '0'

      end if

   else

      if (s) then

          output_digits = trim(output_digits) // '2'

          s = .false.

      else

          s = .true.

      end if

   end if

end do

! Convert output_digits to integer x

read(output_digits, '(I)') x

! Process third part

if (x /= 2 .and. mod(x,2) == 0) then

   x = x +1

end if

do

   sqrt_num = sqrt(real(x))

   found = .false.

   do i = 3, int(sqrt_num), 2

      if (mod(x, i) == 0) then

          found = .true.

          exit

      end if

   end do

   if (.not. found) then

       exit

   else

       x = x + 2

   end if

end do

! Output the result

print*, x

end program main
